## Erc1155.get() method

Get a single NFT Metadata

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(tokenId: BigNumberish): Promise<BundleMetadata>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tokenId | BigNumberish | the tokenId of the NFT to retrieve |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;BundleMetadata&gt;

The NFT metadata

## Example


```javascript
const nft = await contract.get("0");
console.log(nft);
```
